item.title: Shrimp Scampi
item.description: Ingredients 1 lb shrimp 1/3 cup olive oil 1/4 cup cold butter cut into 1 Tbsp chunks 1/2 cup white wine (pinot) 2 Tbsp garlic 2 tsp red pepper flakes 1/4 tsp baking soda 2 Tbsp lemon juice 1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley salt and pepper pasta french bread, sliced thin Directions Thaw and peel your shrimp, then dry them well with paper towels. Put in a sealable bowl and toss with 1 tspn salt and 1/4 tspn baking soda for 15 mins.
